reviews.text: After undergoing renovations for the last couple of years, this hotel has hit its stride. This is the third year in a row I have stayed here for the Western Pennsylvania Cigar Crawl. The rooms are nice and beds comfortable. Make sure if you are a light sleeper, you ask for a room that is away from the highway. My first stay I was up all night from the semi's braking out on 76. I plan to stay there again next year for the fourth crawl.
reviews.title: Very nice for the middle of nowhere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Park Inn West Middlesex is a great place to stay. From the moment you walk in to the moment you leave the staff really wants to make sure that you have a great stay. TJ and Dawn at the front desk are really great. If you have any problems they are willing to fix it for you with a smile.
reviews.title: Would Stay Again

reviews.text: And make sure you stop in to JW's other club. Niki and Heather are great. they make you feel like they have known you for years.
reviews.title: boston driver

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ready to go back
reviews.title: Great place!!!!

reviews.text: I am a truck driver from Boston ma. I stay at the hotel twice a week love it here. love the value customer service best place to stay and relax everything you need is within min from the hotel. Park Inn is all about customer service and making sure you have a great stay.
reviews.title: Here the customer does come 1st !

reviews.text: This hotel has undergone some cosmetic changes. The new decor is nice and welcoming! Rooms are spacious and clean. The hotel is conveniently located off the highway. If you are a light sleeper you will need to request a room away from the bar area.
reviews.title: Some modern additions

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great stay at this hotel. Have to give a shout out to Dawn for great customer service. Very friendly and she went above and beyond by helping us get into our room a little earlier than normal check in time. The room was clean and the king bed was very comfortable. Will be staying here again next time we are in town.
reviews.title: great customer service

reviews.text: I love this place! The people are super friendly! They have great rooms with king beds most new A/C units! Awesome water pressure in the shower. Building ids a little old but they are trying to upgrade. WiFi is very weak in most rooms, could be upgraded.Bar food is delicious and if you can try the Meatloaf and Mashed potatoes.
reviews.title: This place treats you like family!

reviews.text: Gino h Boston Ma
reviews.title: A very nice place to stay

reviews.text: I stay here a couple times a week and i have nothing but good things to say about my stay here at the Park Inn.Thanks to Dawn and Tom also the staff for making my stay an
reviews.title: "always park inn"

reviews.text: This hotel is what I’d describe as an older, convention style hotel that is spread out over a large area. It has been through some renovation, but it looked to me like they did a partial job to make things look nicer at first glance (and on their website). Examples: the bathroom had a makeover including mostly new fixtures, but the bathroom door had a patch under the new doorknob to stop it from pulling through and the door hinges were old and rusted. The entrance area to room still had an old drop ceiling and the section holding the light was sagging quite a bit (see pics)
reviews.title: Older with some renovations

reviews.text: The halls are long and isolated – my wife would be creeped out if traveling alone so consider this while booking -maybe ask for a room near the front. The pool area was closed. The WIFI signal was so weak that I could not log on - huge strike for this business traveler. The bathroom was so small the door almost hit the toilet when opened. Overall, glad my stay was just for one night.
reviews.title: Great Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Funny story: When I checked in, the desk clerk said my assigned room was on the 2nd floor and asked if that was okay, which I confirmed as fine. Then when she directed me to my room by entering through door C, she said that I would be entering on ground level. In that area of the hotel, because it was semi built into a slope, my 2nd floor room was actually on the ground floor. So why exactly did she ask..?..
reviews.title: Nice Hotel for a Stopover

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So for being in the middle of nowhere PA this is a facility that would be a average for me but I had to give it a very good due to the service that I encountered.
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.text: Pulling up to this facility you would think it was a truck stop but you have to head back further to get to the hotel itself. When you walk in you find a very nice entrance and friendly staff. As I checked in I was told the poll and hot tub were out of order so they upgraded ne to a whirlpool suite. Nice customer service.
reviews.title: TJ & Staff do it again!! (management-not so much...)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I found the Park Inn when looking for a place for our wedding guests. I was impressed with how helpful the staff was when making these arrangements (especially having just visited 5 other local hotels). Also, from the time we decided to get a block of rooms until the day of the wedding, everyone was more than willing to assist us in making sure our guests were taken care of. I sent numerous emails making sure that our guests were given the right rate and I received very quick responses. I created gift bags for the overnight guests and the front desk made absolutely sure every single room received their bag -- no worry for me!
reviews.title: Love it here!!!

reviews.text: The staff was so great that we decided to have our rehearsal dinner at the Park Inn. Food was great and reasonably priced - I heard only good things from our friends & family.
reviews.title: Very surprised by this property!

reviews.text: As for our stay, wow! We had a great suite, overlooking the pool area, which is really welcoming - there were chairs there so we could sit and observe. There are places to sit and relax by the pool/jacuzzi and the restaurant is nearby. Rooms were very clean and taken care of. Our request for a late checkout was graciously approved.
reviews.title: No complaints here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best part - EVERY SINGLE person that stayed from our wedding told us how much they loved the hotel. My father liked it so much he was thinking of coming back for his anniversary. I really can't say how great it was to have an indoor pool - something we haven't found in many other hotels in the area.
reviews.title: Very dissatisfied!

reviews.text: The buffet on Sunday was fantastic - an amazing price with amazing food. The wait staff was amazing and gracious in dealing with so many people at once.
reviews.title: Outstanding customer service!
